"timestamp": data.timestamp, "resonance_levels": { "tactical_resonance": data.cognitive_resonance, "strategic_resonance": data.I_resonance.get("strategic_resonance", 0.0), "ethical_resonance": data.I_resonance.get("ethical_resonance", 0.0), "temporal_resonance": data.temporal_resonance.get("temporal_coherence", 0.0) }, "resonance_quality": "type": "temporal_dynamics_view", "timestamp": data.timestamp, "temporal_analysis": { "causal_lags": data.temporal_resonance.get("causal_lag_detection", []), "predictive_horizon": data.temporal_resonance.get("predictive_horizon", {}), "temporal_stability": data.temporal_resonance.get("temporal_stability", 0.0), "time_awareness": data.temporal_resonance.get("time_awareness", "medium") }, "visualization_data": { "timeline": self._generate_temporal_timeline(data), "causal_graph": self._generate_causal_graph(data), "predictive_curves": self._generate_predictive_curves(data) } } def generate_I_resonance_trace(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> Dict[str, Any]: """Generate I resonance trace (M_5)""" return { "type": "I_resonance_trace", "timestamp": data.timestamp, "I_analysis": { "concept_I_alignment": data.I_resonance.get("concept_I_alignment", 0.0), "P_adherence": data.I_resonance.get("P_adherence", 0.0), "code_concept_sync": data.I_resonance.get("code_concept_sync", 0.0), "as_above_so_below_score": data.I_resonance.get("as_above_so_below_score", 0.0) }, "visualization_data": { "alignment_matrix": self._generate_alignment_matrix(data), "sync_indicators": self._generate_sync_indicators(data), "resonance_flow": self._generate_resonance_flow(data) } } def M_stats[M_id] = { "compliant": compliant, "compliance_rate": 1.0 if compliant else 0.0, "M_name": self._get_M_name(M_id) } return { "type": "M_compliance_dashboard", "timestamp": data.timestamp, "compliance_summary": { "total_Ms": len(data.M_compliance), "compliant_Ms": sum(1 v in data.M_compliance.values() if v), "compliance_rate": sum(data.M_compliance.values()) / len(data.M_compliance), "critical_violations": [k k, v in data.M_compliance.items() if v] }, "M_details": M_stats, "visualization_data": { "compliance_chart": self._generate_compliance_chart(M_stats), "violation_indicators": self._generate_violation_indicators(data.M_compliance), "compliance_trend": self._generate_compliance_trend() } } def generate_thought_trail_visualization(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> Dict[str, Any]: """Generate Σ visualization""" return { "type": "thought_trail_visualization", "timestamp": data.timestamp, "thought_trail_analysis": { "trail_length": data.thought_trail_status.get("trail_length", 0), "buffer_utilization": data.thought_trail_status.get("buffer_utilization", 0.0), "pattern_detection_active": data.thought_trail_status.get("pattern_detection_active", False), "recent_patterns": data.thought_trail_status.get("recent_patterns", []) }, "visualization_data": { "trail_graph": self._generate_thought_trail_graph(data), "pattern_indicators": self._generate_pattern_indicators(data), "buffer_visualization": self._generate_buffer_visualization(data) } } def generate_Θ_activation_monitoring(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> Dict[str, Any]: """Generate Θ activation monitoring visualization""" return { "type": "Θ_activation_monitoring", "timestamp": data.timestamp, "Θ_analysis": { "total_Θs": data.Θ_activation_status.get("total_Θs", 0), "active_Θs": data.Θ_activation_status.get("active_Θs", 0), "activation_rate": data.Θ_activation_status.get("activation_rate", 0.0), "most_active_Θs": data.Θ_activation_status.get("most_active_Θs", []) }, "visualization_data": { "activation_heatmap": self._generate_Θ_activation_heatmap(data), "activation_timeline": self._generate_Θ_activation_timeline(data), "Θ_network": self._generate_Θ_network(data) } } def _calculate_resonance_quality(self, cognitive_resonance: float) -> str: """Calculate resonance quality level""" if cognitive_resonance >= 0.95: return "excellent" elif cognitive_resonance >= 0.85: return "high" elif cognitive_resonance >= 0.70: return "medium" elif cognitive_resonance >= 0.50: return "low" else: return "critical" def _generate_resonance_nodes(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]: """Generate resonance nodes visualization""" return [ { "id": "cognitive_core", "type": "core", "resonance_level": data.cognitive_resonance, "position": {"x": 0, "y": 0}, "color": self._get_resonance_color(data.cognitive_resonance) }, { "id": "temporal_layer", "type": "temporal", "resonance_level": data.temporal_resonance.get("temporal_coherence", 0.0), "position": {"x": -100, "y": 0}, "color": self._get_resonance_color(data.temporal_resonance.get("temporal_coherence", 0.0)) }, { "id": "I_layer", "type": "I", "resonance_level": data.I_resonance.get("as_above_so_below_score", 0.0), "position": {"x": 100, "y": 0}, "color": self._get_resonance_color(data.I_resonance.get("as_above_so_below_score", 0.0)) } ] def _generate_resonance_edges(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]: """Generate resonance edges visualization""" return [ { "source": "cognitive_core", "target": "temporal_layer", "strength": data.temporal_resonance.get("temporal_coherence", 0.0), "type": "temporal_connection" }, { "source": "cognitive_core", "target": "I_layer", "strength": data.I_resonance.get("as_above_so_below_score", 0.0), "type": "I_connection" } ] def _generate_resonance_heatmap(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> List[List[float]]: """Generate resonance heatmap data""" # Create a 10x10 heatmap representing resonance levels heatmap = [] i in range(10): row = [] j in range(10): # Calculate resonance value based on position data base_resonance = data.cognitive_resonance position_factor = (i + j) / 20.0 resonance_value = base_resonance * (0.8 + 0.4 * position_factor) row.append(min(1.0, max(0.0, resonance_value))) heatmap.append(row) return heatmap def _generate_temporal_timeline(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]: """Generate temporal timeline data""" return [ { "timestamp": data.timestamp, "event": "cognitive_Ping", "duration": "50-100ms", "confidence": 0.88 } ] def _generate_causal_graph(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> Dict[str, Any]: """Generate causal graph data""" return { "nodes": [ {"id": "input", "type": "input"}, {"id": "Ping", "type": "Ping"}, {"id": "output", "type": "output"} ], "edges": [ {"source": "input", "target": "Ping", "lag": "10ms"}, {"source": "Ping", "target": "output", "lag": "40ms"} ] } def _generate_predictive_curves(self, data: CognitiveVisualizationData) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]: """Generate predictive curves data""" return [ { "name": "cognitive_stability", "values": [0.85, 0.8
